attributes.action: That it is done legally not violation of any laws pertaining to road traffic act
attributes.additional_details: Has served his country in both a military capacity and as a civil servant working for the military within the mod. Genuine all round good egg.
attributes.background: Doesn't want to find himself in the position as will thousands this Christmas in that he will be alone. He feels the government should act to ensure that no one in the uk is by themselves and alone at Christmas .

rejection.details: We don't know what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
